New Records: Amen Thompson had a career-high 16 rebounds
Alperen Sengun missed 1 of 2 free throws
Key Match Events: Fred VanVleet stole the inbounds pass
A dunk by Thompson started a 7-2 run
Pre-Game Insights: The Lakers were expected to win but struggled early
Post-Match Reflections: LeBron James commented on the refs not acknowledging his timeout
Miscellaneous Highlights: Anthony Davis had 30 points and 13 rebounds for the Lakers
The Rockets had 52 points in the paint to 40 by the Lakers
Others: The game was significant for the Rockets as Thompson stepped up with Smith injured
